name: Guacamelee! 2

files.setup: N/A: Please select the setup.exe downloaded from GOG.com

content:
files:
- setup: 'N/A: Please select the setup.exe downloaded from GOG.com'
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Guacamelee 2/Guac2_64.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2015 win7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: compiler
wine:
  dxvk: true
